title: Historian on the expansion of the South - effect

content.question: Which of the following was the most significant impact of the Southâ€™s expansion described in the excerpt?

choices.label: Conflict over the future of slavery

content.answer: Conflict over the future of slavery

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
